sentences.english: When it ticks faster, we can process more.
sentences.chinese: 被喀答声加快以后，我们可以处理更多的信息。

sentences.english: Ned burst into a fit of giggles while he was on the phone.
sentences.chinese: 奈德讲电话时突然爆出一阵喀喀的笑声。

sentences.english: Ned burst into a fit of giggles while he was on the phone.
sentences.chinese: 奈德讲电话时突然爆出一阵喀喀的笑声。

sentences.english: Cameroon Ministry of Communications has also ordered three companies of informal long-distance passenger business for rectification.
sentences.chinese: 喀交通部还勒令三家非正规长途客运公司停业整顿。

sentences.english: You know it fits, man, when it clicks.
sentences.chinese: 老兄，你会知道扣好了，在它喀擦一声时。

sentences.english: The key clicked as it turned in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 钥匙在锁孔里转动，发出喀哒的声音。

sentences.english: Of the tree which grew by the tomb, near the head of Kalos, they also spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他们还谈到了喀洛斯枕边的那棵坟头树。

sentences.english: Tyche was the name of the "good sister" of Nemesis.
sentences.chinese: 在神话中，堤喀是涅墨西斯的“好姐妹”。

sentences.english: The typical sign was audible click and systolic murmur in cardiac apex.
sentences.chinese: 典型体征为心尖区闻及喀喇音和收缩期杂音。

sentences.english: The gate hooked shut with a click as he left the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他离开园子时将门喀哒一声钩得关上。

sentences.english: Then Eros came to Psyche's home with his mother's instructions.
sentences.chinese: 而爱洛斯也奉其母亲的命令来到了普绪喀的家。
她喀哒一声把提包关上了。

sentences.english: You know the folks in Culiacan and Cartagena?
sentences.chinese: 你认识库利亚坎和喀他赫纳的人？

sentences.english: Formerly known as Outer Mongolia or Kamika Mongolia, formerly a part of China.
sentences.chinese: 原称外蒙古或喀尔喀蒙古，原为中国的一部分。

sentences.english: A member of the Caddo people of NE Texas.
sentences.chinese: 东北德克萨斯州的喀多族人。

definition: (onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
sound of an explosion/sound of sth throbbing or bursting
